meanings.definition: To put on (a piece of clothing)
meanings.sent1: She was donning her favorite dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: He donned his coat before heading out into the cold.
meanings.sent3: The cat was donning a tiny hat for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent4: The sun was donning its golden robe as it set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The knight was donning his shining armor before battle.

meanings.sent1: The actor was donning the role of a detective in the play.
meanings.sent2: She donned a smile to hide her disappointment.
meanings.sent3: The dog was donning the persona of a guard dog, barking at every noise.
meanings.sent4: The chameleon was donning the colors of the leaves to blend in with its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The student was donning the identity of a scientist for the science fair.
